title: WP_Block
description: Class representing a parsed instance of a block.

parsed_block.description: Original parsed array representation of block.

block_type.description: Block type associated with the instance.

inner_blocks.description: List of inner blocks (of this same class). Note that this is always empty as it represents a WP_Block_List instance which has no public properties.

inner_html.description: Resultant HTML from inside block comment delimiters after removing inner blocks.

inner_content.description: List of string fragments and null markers where inner blocks were found.

attributes.description: Attributes validated against the current block schema, populating defaulted and missing values. Lazily loaded, so not always present.
